messages.content: Provide me a sample performance appraisal for a research scientist

Here is a sample performance appraisal for a research scientist:
Research Scientist Employee Name:
Jane Smith Employee ID:
Position: Research Scientist
The purpose of this performance appraisal is to summarize the performance of Jane Smith for the 2016-2017 year. Jane was hired as a Research Scientist on August 1, 2016, and has worked in the position for over a year.
Jane has been a valuable addition to the team, and has consistently shown a strong work ethic and dedication to her field. She has demonstrated excellent skills in her role, and has worked hard to master the skills needed to do her job well. She has consistently exceeded expectations, and her work has been exemplary.
Jane has consistently demonstrated the following attributes:
She has consistently demonstrated the following attributes:
Ability to work independently and as part of a team 
Quality work 
Attention to detail 
Energy and enthusiasm 
Commitment to the mission and goals of the organization 
Jane has also shown an excellent ability to learn and grow, and has consistently sought out new ways to improve herself and her work. We are excited to see how her work continues to develop.
